Text:
Enjoying the beautiful mosques of Saudi-Arabia is like appreciating the classic churches of 1939 Germany. 

@ chisinaumoldova: It's easy to blame religion, but afterall organized religion is just a big pool of stupid people. They would still be there if religion disappeared.

I can't believe how intollerant and ignorant the people who wrote some of these comments are...from what you have written it seems like it might be stupid people like you who can only understand the world in which they live by pigeon holing everyone else in a pathetic attempt to make sense of what is happening to you
